data.title: Animation Techniques: The Adventures of Prince Achmed (1926)
data.meta_description: Prince Achmed Animation - Free download as Powerpoint Presentation (.ppt / .pptx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. The document discusses the 1926 animated film The Adventures of Prince Achmed, the first feature-length animated film, created using silhouette animation techniques by German animator Lotte Reiniger; it provides background on Reiniger and the film, examines an extract, and asks students to analyze the animation technique and create their own short animations in the style of Reiniger.
